title: mOhana mAyAvI
sahitya:
mOhana mAyAvI manamOhana mAyAvI jaya mudamangaLadAyi


anupallavi

  dEhAlayamulO koluvaiyuNDu dEhI jagatrakSakA pAhI


caraNam    AnandamAna svarUpA Om harihara guha parabrahmA mammu pAtramugA
nimitta mAtramugA konavayyA pAlincu kaliyuga varadA hE parama dayA niratA Om
